item.description:
Please Join us for our 2nd Wet Wednesday... Remember it's Happy Hour the first Wednesday of Every month!

The Drift Away has a special every Wednesday night it's called "WOW" Wine on Wednesdays...  Your first glass is .50 cents.. And for us the Drift Away has opened it up to all house alcohol.

We will be joining folks from 2 other meetup groups "Eat, Drink, & Be Merry" & "Boston Ski" for this monthly venue!

Our April Wet Wednesday was so well attended that in May, the Drift Away is giving us our own room.

This Wet Wednesdays will once again be at the Drift Away in No Hampton, NH... In June when the weather gets warmer we will try the deck at "Castaway's" in Seabrook.

Hope to see you there it will be fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Group from "Eat, Drink & Be Merry"

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: It's "Wet Wednesday".. .50 cents first drink/The first Wednesday of the month!
